name: Omneta
description:
-=-=-=-=-=-=-= GAMEPLAY =-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Explore and platform trough the mysterious non-euclidean caves of Omneta.

Use your magic powers to summon ghosts to help you traverse.

You are never alone and always watched...

-=-=-=-=-=-=-= MADE BY =-=-=-=-=-=-=-

ChaoticAurora

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Made in 7 days for the brackeys game jam
